original_text: He said to them, “It is not for you to know times or seasons that the Father has fixed by his own authority.
korean_text: 이르시되 때와 시기는 아버지께서 자기의 권한에 두셨으니 너희가 알 바 아니요

sentences.original_text: It is not for you to know times or seasons
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 시기나 때를 아는 것이 아니라
